scripts.preinstall: if [ "$SKIP_PREINSTALL" != "true" ]; then node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('pnpm') === -1) throw new Error('You must use pnpm to install dependencies')"; else echo 'Skipping preinstall script'; fi
scripts.build: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && pnpm generate-declarations
